form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: Point Sal Growers and Packers California Vegetables, Form 4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 5/10/2023 CARROTS CAULIFLOWER CELERY ENDIVE LETTUCE POTATOES POINT SAL GROWERS AND PACKERS CALIFORNIA VEGETABLES P. O. Box 906 - Phone 4184 GUADALUPE, CALIFORNIA November 10, 1962 American Consul Tijuana, Baja California Mexico This is to certify that MARGARITA FAUSTO has worked for us the past eight years. She averages $150.00 per month in wages during the year. Her work is very satisfactory and her chances to continue working are excellent. Very truly yours, Beliei KENNETH G. BELIER, Manager
